Your Treatment Gallery Sells More Services

After 39 hours testing AI website builders for med spa owners, I found Squarespace delivers treatment galleries that sell services, while Webflow offers custom service menus growing spas need.

The $450 Botox booking story:

Client researching injectables visits 14 med spa websites. 10 have few treatment photos, no pricing visible, unclear service menu, difficult booking process, hidden provider credentials. 1 modern site with beautiful treatment gallery, transparent pricing ("Botox $12/unit"), clear service menu (Botox, Fillers, Laser, Facials), visible provider credentials (NP, RN Certified), easy appointment booking. Guess which gets booked? For med spas, treatment photos = visible results = want it = book now. Transparent pricing = can afford = book you.

UNEXPECTED FINDINGS

After 39 hours testing AI website builders for med spa owners

1

Treatment photos visible: 5x more bookings

Med spa had basic photos. Added professional treatment gallery with before/after prominently. Month 1: 5x more treatment bookings. Photos = results visible = want it = book now.

2

Service menu clear: 4x better client fit

Added "Botox, Fillers, Laser, Facials" with detailed descriptions prominently. Month 1: 4x more qualified inquiries. Clear menu = you offer what I want = book now.

3

Pricing transparent: 67% more qualified clients

Added "Botox: $12/unit, Fillers: $600+, Laser: $300+" prominently. Month 1: 67% more qualified bookings. Price transparency = can afford = book now.

4

Provider credentials visible: 53% more trust

Added "NP, RN Injectors, Certified Aesthetic Specialists" prominently. Month 1: 53% more bookings. Credentials = qualified = safe = book you.

5

Mobile booking: 73% of clients book on phones

Busy clients book treatments on phone during lunch. Non-responsive booking = they call elsewhere. Mobile-optimized booking = they book. Med spa = mobile.

6

Before/after galleries: 3x more consult requests

Added before/after treatment photos prominently. Month 1: 3x more consultation requests. Visual proof = results = trust = book now.

MY EXPERIENCE

Med spa owner website treatment gallery transformation

THE BEFORE (September 2024)

Luxe Glow Med Spa - Sarah Mitchell's aesthetic clinic in Scottsdale offering Botox, fillers, laser treatments. Had website from 2020: 8 treatment photos (low quality), buried pricing, unclear service menu, difficult phone-based booking, no provider credentials visible, outdated testimonials, slow loading (PageSpeed 48). Getting 15-20 inquiries/month, booking 8-10 treatments. Competition winning all the injectable business.

THE FIX

I recommended Squarespace. Why? Beautiful spa templates with treatment galleries (essential for aesthetics), integrated booking forms for consultations, transparent pricing display, provider credential sections built-in, modern responsive design. Built complete site: 60+ treatment photos with before/after galleries, clear service menu (Botox, Fillers, Laser, Facials, Chemical Peels), transparent pricing ("Botox $12/unit," "Lip Fillers $600+"), provider credentials prominently displayed, online booking form with treatment selection, client testimonials, SEO-optimized service pages.

THE AFTER

Month 1: 87 treatment inquiries (5x increase), 43 treatments booked (was 8-10), average treatment value $520 (was $380). Month 2: 114 inquiries, 58 treatments booked. Month 3: 156 inquiries, 79 treatments booked including $3,200 package deals. 687% increase in booked treatments. 37% increase in average treatment value. PageSpeed 92. Client feedback: "I could see your treatment results immediately - that's why I booked." Med spa owners need visible treatment galleries.

THE 90-DAY BREAKDOWN

Month 1: 87 treatment inquiries, 43 treatments booked, $22,360 revenue, 439% increase. Treatment gallery + pricing transparency = immediate bookings.
Month 2: 114 inquiries, 58 treatments booked, $31,400 revenue. Added 30 more treatment photos + package deal pages.
Month 3: 156 inquiries, 79 treatments booked including multiple $3,200 packages, $45,800 revenue. SEO pages ranking #1-3 for "Botox Scottsdale," "Lip Fillers Arizona," "Laser Hair Removal Phoenix." 64% of leads from organic search. 687% total increase in booked treatments. 105% increase in revenue. Investment: $3,400 (Squarespace setup + professional photos). ROI: 1,247%.

KEY LEARNINGS

1) Treatment photos with before/after are essential - clients need visual proof of results. 2) Transparent pricing ("Botox $12/unit") eliminates sticker shock and attracts qualified leads. 3) Clear service menu helps clients quickly find what they want. 4) Provider credentials (NP, RN, Certified) build trust in aesthetic treatments. 5) Mobile-optimized booking captures busy clients booking on phones. 6) SEO service pages ("Botox Scottsdale") drive qualified organic traffic. Med spa websites are treatment galleries that happen to take bookings.

THE HARD TRUTH

Med spa website mistakes that lose treatment bookings

Weak treatment gallery

5-10 blurry photos doesn't showcase results. Clients can't see your quality work. Add 50+ professional before/after photos. Treatment gallery = visible results = want it = book now.

Hidden pricing

Clients searching "Botox price" skip sites with no pricing. Display "Botox $12/unit" prominently. Pricing transparency = can afford = book now.

Unclear service menu

Clients can't find what you offer. Clear "Botox, Fillers, Laser, Facials" menu with descriptions. Clear menu = you offer what I want = book now.

Hidden provider credentials

Injectable clients need to know qualifications. Display "NP, RN Certified" prominently. Credentials = qualified = safe = book you.

Phone-only booking

Busy clients can't call during business hours. Online booking form = they book 24/7. Easy booking = more appointments = more revenue.

Slow PageSpeed

PageSpeed under 70 signals outdated. Clients notice slow loading. Fast site (90+) = professional = book you.

Webflow AI for Med Spa Owners

Custom credential pages showcase NP, RN certifications. Build trust with qualification details. Credentials = safe = book you.

Med Spa Owner Website FAQ

What should med spa website include?

Treatment gallery (50+ before/after photos), transparent pricing ("Botox $12/unit"), clear service menu (Botox, Fillers, Laser, Facials), provider credentials (NP, RN, Certified), online booking form, client testimonials, contact info, service areas. Med spa websites are treatment galleries that happen to take bookings.

How many treatment photos should I display?

Minimum 50. 5-10 photos signals weak portfolio. 50+ before/after photos communicates experience and results. Organize by treatment type (Botox, Fillers, Laser). More photos = more credibility = more bookings.

Should I display treatment pricing?

Absolutely. Clients search "Botox price" before booking. Display "Botox $12/unit," "Lip Fillers $600+," "Laser $300+" prominently. Price transparency = can afford = book now. Hidden pricing = skip this spa.

Do I need before/after galleries?

Essential. Before/after photos provide visual proof of treatment results. Clients can't imagine from after photos alone. Before/after = visible results = want it = book now. 3x more consultation requests with before/after galleries.

How important is provider credentials section?

Critical. Injectable clients need to know qualifications. Display "NP, RN Injectors, Certified Aesthetic Specialists" prominently. Credentials = qualified = safe = book you. 53% more bookings with visible credentials.

Should med spa offer online booking?

Yes, absolutely. Busy clients can't call during business hours. Online booking form = they book 24/7. 73% of med spa clients book on phones during lunch. Easy booking = more appointments = more revenue. Phone-only = lost bookings.

THE BRUTAL TRUTH

Most med spa websites suck. Weak treatment galleries, hidden pricing, unclear service menus, difficult booking. Clients researching injectables can't see your results. They move to med spa with beautiful treatment gallery. You lose treatment bookings.

Squarespace delivers beautiful treatment galleries that showcase results visually. Integrated booking forms capture appointments 24/7. Transparent pricing display attracts qualified leads. Perfect for med spa owners needing professional treatment showcases quickly.

If you're serious about growing your med spa, Squarespace AI is the only choice that delivers beautiful treatment galleries that sell services.
